results.title: Videodrome
results.creator_credit: David Cronenberg, Claude Heroux, Guardian Trust Company and Filmplan International
results.brief_description: Sci-fi horror filmmaker David Cronenberg’s diabolical invader is a television show that seduces and controls its viewers. Featuring Deborah Harry as a kinky hostess, James Woods as a cable programmer looking for the ultimate in viewing thrills, this is a pulsating science fiction nightmare about a world where video can insidiously control and alter human life.

results.title: Video maker
results.creator_credit: Shane Yeend, Scott Young, Nine Network (Australia) and Alliance Productions
results.brief_description: Video maker is designed to help transform the confused home video operator into a budding video director. This tape looks at topics such as focus, handheld and zoom, camera editing, depth of field and exposure as well as looking at terminology, different filming techniques and equipment.

results.title: Victory in the West = Sieg im Westen
results.brief_description: The official German army film, covering its campaigns in Belgium, Holland and France in May and June of 1940. An army film on the conquest of the Low Countries and France, using authentic material. The campaign is explained in detail with maps. Silent film.
results.title_for_label: Victory in the West = Sieg im Westen

results.title: Victorian vintage
results.brief_description: Dr. W.S. Benwell, a wine specialist, takes the viewer on a conducted tour of the wine growing areas of Victoria. Includes Yeringberg, an old vineyard which has been re-established near Melbourne, Bailey’s vineyard and the Rutherglen Wine Festival, the Swan Hill area, Chateau Tahbilk, the Grampians area of Western Victoria (Great Western Champagne country) and back to Melbourne.

results.title: Victorian Tapestry Workshop
results.creator_credit: Paul Jansen, Ivan Hexter and Victorian Film Corporation
results.brief_description: The Victorian Tapestry Workshop was established in 1976 with State Government assistance. This film shows the efforts of the workshop in transforming a Roger Kemp painting into a major tapestry.
